context: the patient is a very nice patient with adenotonsillitis with hypertrophy and obstructive symptoms.
the patient is a very nice patient with adenotonsillitis with hypertrophy and obstructive symptoms.
a mcivor mouth gag was applied.
a red rubber robinson catheter was inserted through the left naris and the soft palate was retracted superiorly.
the adenoids were removed with suction electrocautery under mere visualization.
the left tonsil was grasped with a curved allis forceps, retracted medially and the anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with bovie electrocautery.
copious saline irrigation of the oral cavity was then performed.
there was no further identifiable bleeding at the termination of the procedure.

text: estimated blood loss less than 10 ml
context: the estimated blood loss was less than 10 ml.
the patient was extubated in the operating room, brought to the recovery room in satisfactory condition.
